allow: Bash(export PATH="/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin:$PATH" && PGPASSWORD=password psql -U postgres -c "SELECT 1;" 2>&1)
Bash(export PATH="/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin:$PATH" && pg_ctl restart -D "/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/data" 2>&1)
Bash(export PATH="/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin:$PATH" && psql -U postgres -h localhost -c "SELECT 1;" 2>&1)
Bash(export PATH="/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin:$PATH" && psql -U postgres -h localhost -c "ALTER USER postgres WITH PASSWORD 'password';" 2>&1)
Bash(export PATH="/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin:$PATH" && PGPASSWORD=password psql -U postgres -h localhost -c "SELECT 1;" 2>&1)
Bash(export PATH="/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin:$PATH" && PGPASSWORD=password psql -U postgres -h localhost -c "CREATE DATABASE project_3;" 2>&1)
Bash(export PATH="/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin:$PATH" && PGPASSWORD=password psql -U postgres -h localhost -d project_3 -c "\\dt" 2>&1)

Bash(export PATH="/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin:$PATH" && PGPASSWORD=password psql -U postgres -h localhost -d project_3 -c "
SELECT 'users' as tabel, count\(*\) FROM users
UNION ALL SELECT 'categories', count\(*\) FROM categories
UNION ALL SELECT 'brands', count\(*\) FROM brands
UNION ALL SELECT 'unit_of_measures', count\(*\) FROM unit_of_measures
UNION ALL SELECT 'unit_lembaga', count\(*\) FROM unit_lembaga
UNION ALL SELECT 'suppliers', count\(*\) FROM suppliers
UNION ALL SELECT 'products', count\(*\) FROM products;
" 2>&1)
